price: 65. Boganga lelo te. Ya soló, bokozua lisungi na biso ata шоке te.
arabic: لَا تَجۡـَٔرُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ إِنَّكُم مِّنَّا لَا تُنصَرُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: lā tajarū al-yawma innakum minnā lā tunṣarūna
